roleset.name: eat (a lot) celebratorily
roleset.note: FEAST-V NOTES: Frames file for 'feast' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 39.5, Framenet entry Ingestion. (from feast.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Law firms that [*T*-1] have feasted and grown on the revenue from mergers and acquisitions work are feeling the squeeze as that work declines.
example.arg: on the revenue from mergers and acquisitions work

example.name: intransitive
example.text: Last night, John feasted. Today, he eats only Tums.
